Description.Name: MaSimDaysDecayModulator
Description.Details: Number of days that can elapse before a pilot's affinities begin to decay.

setResult: Number of days until affinity decay {RES_VALUE.ToString}%
positiveResult: Increase number of days until affinity decay by {RES_VALUE.ToString}%
negativeResult: Decreases number of days until affinity decay by {RES_VALUE.ToString}%
temporalSetResult: Number of days until affinity decay {RES_VALUE.ToString}%
temporalPositiveResult: Increase number of days until affinity decay by {RES_VALUE.ToString}%
temporalNegativeResult: Decreases number of days until affinity decay by {RES_VALUE.ToString}%
infinitiveSetResult: Number of days until affinity decay {RES_VALUE.ToString}%
infinitivePositiveResult: Increases number of days until affinity decay by {RES_VALUE.ToString}%
infinitiveNegativeResult: Decreases number of days until affinity decay by {RES_VALUE.ToString}%
